info.title: E-Commerce TechShop API
info.description: API documentation for E-Commerce TechShop application

tags.name: Admin Product Management
tags.description: APIs for admin to approve/reject products

tags.name: User Management
tags.description: APIs for user registration, authentication and profile management

tags.name: Brand Management
tags.description: APIs for managing product brands

tags.name: B2C Product Management
tags.description: Product management APIs for B2C stores - Handle product creation, updates, and catalog management

tags.name: Store Browsing
tags.description: Public APIs for browsing and discovering stores

tags.name: B2C Product Variant Management
tags.description: Product variant management APIs for B2C stores - Handle product variants, colors, sizes, and image uploads

tags.name: Buyer Address Management
tags.description: Address management APIs for buyers - Handle delivery address creation, updates, and management

tags.name: Review Management
tags.description: APIs for product reviews and rating statistics

tags.name: Buyer Cart Management
tags.description: Shopping cart management APIs for buyers - Handle adding, updating, removing items, and cart operations

tags.name: Public Promotion APIs
tags.description: Public APIs to view promotions - No authentication required

tags.name: Admin Store Management
tags.description: APIs for admin to manage stores - approval, rejection, status updates

tags.name: Password Reset
tags.description: APIs for forgot password and reset password functionality

tags.name: B2C Store Management
tags.description: Store management APIs for B2C sellers - Handle store creation, updates, approval process, and media uploads

tags.name: Category Management
tags.description: APIs for managing product categories

tags.name: Product Variant Browsing
tags.description: Public APIs for browsing product variants with specific colors, sizes, and pricing

tags.name: B2C Analytics
tags.description: Analytics APIs for B2C store management - Provides comprehensive analytics and reporting features for store owners

tags.name: Buyer Order Management
tags.description: APIs for buyer order operations

tags.name: Buyer Review Management
tags.description: APIs for buyer review operations

tags.name: B2C Order Management
tags.description: Order management APIs for B2C stores - Handle order processing, status updates, and order analytics

tags.name: Product Browsing
tags.description: Public APIs for browsing and searching products

tags.name: Admin Promotion Management
tags.description: Promotion management APIs for Platform Admin - Create platform-wide promotions

tags.name: B2C Promotion Management
tags.description: Promotion management APIs for B2C stores - Handle discount campaigns, coupon codes, and promotional offers

put.description: Update the avatar image of the currently authenticated user

get.description: Retrieve a specific category by its ID

put.description: Update an existing category by ID
Update an existing review (only by the review owner)

delete.description: Delete a review (only by the review owner)

put.description: Cancel an order (only allowed for PENDING status)
Update the quantity of a specific product variant in the shopping cart

parameters.name: productVariantId
parameters.description: ID of the product variant to update

parameters.name: colorId
parameters.description: Color ID of the product variant (optional)

delete.description: Remove a specific product variant completely from the shopping cart

parameters.name: productVariantId
parameters.description: ID of the product variant to remove

parameters.name: colorId
parameters.description: Color ID of the product variant (optional)

put.description: Update an existing address by ID (index)

parameters.name: addressId
parameters.description: Address ID (index in the list, starting from 0)

delete.description: Delete a specific address by ID (index). User can have multiple addresses and delete them individually

parameters.name: addressId
parameters.description: Address ID (index in the list, starting from 0)

get.description: Retrieve a specific brand by its ID

put.description: Update an existing brand by ID
Update basic information of an existing store

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: ID of the store to update

delete.description: Soft delete a store by changing status to DELETED. Store data is preserved but becomes inactive

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: ID of the store to soft delete

put.description: Reject a pending store registration with reason (Admin function). Changes status from PENDING to REJECTED

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: ID of the store to reject

put.description: Update the logo image for a specific store. Only available for APPROVED stores. Replaces existing logo if present

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: ID of the store to update logo for

file.description: Logo image file (JPG, PNG, GIF supported)

put.description: Update the banner image for a specific store. Only available for APPROVED stores. Used for store decoration and branding

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: ID of the store to update banner for

file.description: Banner image file (JPG, PNG, GIF supported, recommended size: 1200x400px)

put.description: Approve a pending store registration (Admin function). Changes status from PENDING to APPROVED

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: ID of the store to approve

get.description: Retrieve detailed information of a specific promotion

parameters.name: promotionId
parameters.description: ID of the promotion to retrieve

put.description: Update an existing promotion's information including discount rules and validity period

parameters.name: promotionId
parameters.description: ID of the promotion to update

delete.description: Delete a promotion (permanently remove from system)

parameters.name: promotionId
parameters.description: ID of the promotion to delete

put.description: Deactivate a promotion to stop customers from using it

parameters.name: promotionId
parameters.description: ID of the promotion to deactivate

put.description: Activate a promotion to make it available for customers to use

parameters.name: promotionId
parameters.description: ID of the promotion to activate

put.description: Update an existing product's information including name, description, price, category, brand, images, and specifications

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the product to update

put.description: Update the stock quantity of a product variant. Only affects inventory quantity, price remains unchanged.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the product variant to update

put.description: Update the selling price of a product variant. Only affects price, stock quantity remains unchanged.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the product variant to update

put.description: Update a specific color option of a product variant including its image

parameters.name: colorId
parameters.description: ID of the specific color option to update

image.description: Optional replacement image for this color option

put.description: Update the status of an order (PENDING, CONFIRMED, SHIPPING, DELIVERED, CANCELLED)
Mark order as shipped and change status to SHIPPING

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: ID of the order to ship

put.description: Mark order as delivered and change status to DELIVERED

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: ID of the order to mark as delivered

put.description: Confirm a pending order and change status to CONFIRMED

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: ID of the order to confirm

put.description: Cancel an order and change status to CANCELLED with optional reason

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: ID of the order to cancel

put.description: Update the status of a store (activate/deactivate)

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: ID of the store to update

put.description: Reject a pending store registration with a reason

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: ID of the store to reject

parameters.name: reason
parameters.example: Không đủ điều kiện kinh doanh

put.description: Approve a pending store registration

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: ID of the store to approve

put.description: Deactivate any promotion to stop it from being used

parameters.name: promotionId
parameters.description: ID of the promotion to deactivate

put.description: Activate any promotion to make it available

parameters.name: promotionId
parameters.description: ID of the promotion to activate

put.description: Update an existing platform-wide promotion. Only platform admin can use this.

parameters.name: promotionId
parameters.description: ID of the promotion to update

post.description: Reset user password using the token received via email
Send password reset email with token to user's email address
Register a new user account, sends email verification
Authenticate user with email and password, returns JWT token
Handle Google OAuth authentication callback and login user

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of categories with sorting options

post.description: Create a new category with validation
Create a new review for a product with rating and comment
Process selected cart items and create orders grouped by store
Add one or multiple products to the shopping cart. If product already exists, quantity will be updated

schema.description: List of cart items to add including product variant ID and quantity

get.description: Retrieve all delivery addresses of the current user

post.description: Create a new delivery address for the current user

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of brands with sorting options

post.description: Create a new brand with validation
Create a new store with basic information and optional logo. Store will be in PENDING status awaiting admin approval
Calculate the exact discount amount that will be applied for a specific order value

parameters.name: orderValue
parameters.description: Order value to calculate discount for

post.description: Create promotion for a specific store. Issuer and storeId will be auto-assigned. Only store owner can use this.

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: ID of the store creating the promotion

post.description: Create a new product for the store with comprehensive product information including name, description, price, category, and specifications
Create a new product variant with specifications like size, color, price, and multiple product images
Create a new product variant with basic information (size, color, price) without uploading images. Images can be added later using the upload endpoint.

post.summary: Add color option to product variant
post.description: Add a new color option to an existing product variant with its specific image

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the product variant to add color to

image.description: Image file for this specific color variant

post.description: Create platform-wide promotion. Issuer will be auto-assigned as PLATFORM and storeId will be null. Only platform admin can use this.

Retrieve detailed store information including description, location, and contact details

parameters.description: Order value to validate against promotion conditions

get.description: Retrieve all active promotions of a specific type (PERCENTAGE, FIXED_AMOUNT, etc.)

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of promotion to filter by

get.description: Retrieve all promotions for a specific store (both active and inactive)
Retrieve all active platform-wide promotions
Calculate the exact discount amount for a specific order value

parameters.name: orderValue
parameters.description: Order value to calculate discount for

get.description: Retrieve all currently active promotions across all stores and platform
Retrieve all currently active promotions for a specific store
Search for products using product name (partial match supported)
Retrieve detailed product information by product ID
Retrieve all products belonging to a specific category

get.summary: Get products by category and brand
get.description: Retrieve products filtered by both category and brand
Retrieve detailed product variant information including pricing, inventory, and specifications
Browse all product variants from a specific store with pagination
Search for product variants by name with case-insensitive matching

get.summary: Get all variants of a product
get.description: Retrieve all available variants (colors, sizes) for a specific product
Retrieve recently added product variants with pagination and sorting
Browse all product variants in a specific category

get.summary: Get product variants by category and brand
get.description: Browse product variants filtered by both category and brand

get.description: Check whether a category exists by its ID
Retrieve a specific category by its name

get.description: Check whether a category exists by its name
Retrieve complete list of all categories
Retrieve all reviews created by the current authenticated user

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by order status (PENDING, CONFIRMED, SHIPPING, DELIVERED, CANCELLED)

get.description: Retrieve detailed information of a specific order
Retrieve all items in the current user's shopping cart with detailed product information and totals
Retrieve the total number of items in the shopping cart and whether the cart is empty. Useful for cart badge display
Check whether the current user has a delivery address configured. Useful for checkout validation

Retrieve comprehensive order statistics for a store including counts by status, trends, and performance metrics

Retrieve sales trend analysis showing growth patterns and seasonal variations
Retrieve sales breakdown by product categories to identify top-performing categories
Retrieve comprehensive review analytics including average ratings, total reviews, and review trends
Retrieve distribution of ratings (1-5 stars) for store products
Retrieve analytics about pending reviews that need store owner response
Retrieve revenue analytics for a specific time period (daily, weekly, monthly, yearly)
Retrieve revenue analytics for a custom date range
Retrieve comprehensive product analytics including total products, views, sales performance
Retrieve top-selling products based on sales volume or revenue

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of top products to retrieve

get.description: Retrieve comprehensive performance metrics including KPIs, conversion rates, and efficiency indicators
Retrieve order statistics and trends for a specific time period
Retrieve analytics about order status distribution (pending, confirmed, shipped, delivered, cancelled)
Retrieve inventory analytics including stock levels, low stock alerts, and inventory turnover

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: ID of the store to get analytics for

get.description: Retrieve customer analytics including total customers, new customers, and customer behavior metrics
Retrieve top customers based on purchase amount or order frequency

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of top customers to retrieve

Retrieve all stores that are waiting for admin approval

ReviewDTO.description: Review information including rating, comment, and product variant ID

UpdateQuantityDTO.description: New quantity for the cart item

ProductDTO.description: Product information including name, description, price, category, brand, images, and specifications

ColorOption.description: Color option information including color name, hex code, and additional properties

ResetPasswordDTO.description: Reset password data with token and new password

OrderDTO.description: Order information including selected items, delivery address and payment method

CreateAddressDTO.description: Address information including street, city, province, postal code, and contact details

StoreDTO.description: Store information including name, description, address, contact details

CreatePromotionDTO.description: Promotion information (issuer and storeId not required - auto-assigned)

ProductVariantDTO.description: Product variant information including product ID, size, color, price, and stock quantity
